original: intros l i i' H1 H2. intros e H3 H4. unfold contiguous_range_exact_lo in *. destruct H1 as [H5 H6]. split. - intros i0 H7. specialize (H5 i0 H7). destruct H5 as [e' [H8 H9]]. exists e'. split; auto. apply in_app_iff in H9. apply in_or_app. destruct H9. + left; auto. + right. simpl in H9. destruct H9 as [H9 | H9]. * left; auto. * right; apply removeAfterIndex_in; auto. - intros e0 H7. apply in_app_or in H7. destruct H7 as [H7 | H7]. + apply removeAfterIndex_in; auto. + apply H6; auto.
